Token.Abstract: Convenience method to return the current OS version as a struct of three NSIntegers. Using UIDevice's currentDevice method and the current device's systemVersion returns a string delimited by a period which can then be split into an array. This method returns a struct storing each value instead of a string or array. Used in DTCoreTextLayoutFrame to workaround the way iOS 4.2 handles images.
Returns the current OS version of the device.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A DTSimpleVersion struct with three fields each of type NSInteger storing the major, minor, and point numbers identifying this OS version.
